TopicTitle: Identify that Movie...from the Wrong Character Names!

Articles.Content:
How it works:

Describe the basic plot of a movie, but use character names that the actors have played in other movies. Other players try to guess the movie and actors, whoever gets it right first posts the next clue. Please include at least two characters in your clue.

Example:

Clue: Forrest Gump, Private Hudson, and Sebastian Shaw attempt to survive an ill-fated moon mission.

Answer: Apollo 13 (Tom Hanks, Bill Paxton, Kevin Bacon)

I'll start:

Lucius Fox and Woody Blake become good friends while serving long sentences in a corrupt prison.

Edited August 28, 2014 by Red Iron Crown

The Shawshank Redemption

Seymour Parrish tends to his offspring undercover.

Mrs. Doubtfire (Robin Williams )

Bruce Bannister and Benjamin Button begin boxing before bigger badness.

Fight Club (Brad Pitt, Edward Norton)

Darth Vader grants Pluto Nash a special holiday to find his place in the world.

Coming to America (James Earl Jones, Eddie Murphy)

Jack Ryan tries to recapture his plane from hijacker Commissioner Gordon.

I had to google to be sure you meant the right movie - "The Prince of Zamunda" is the translation of the German title.

Airforce One (Harrison Ford, Gary Oldman)

(Some RL Russians next to our seats hat laughing fits whenever the movie's "Russians" started talking. )

Captain Sharp ruins Alexander Dane's day.

Die Hard (Bruce Willis, Alan Rickman)

Lloyd Christmas attempts to escape the fake world run by Gene Kranz.
